website_summaries.verdict: When you want to take the entire crew ice fishing, this 6 to 8 person tent is the perfect option.
pros: Good roof height of 81 inches, so you won't have to stoop when you stand up inside the shelter
Folds down to a size that you can carry
Has a waterproof material in the tent to keep you dry
Seems to be easier to set up and take down than other large ice fishing shelters
cons: Has dimensions of 137.5 by 68.5 inches, so a little smaller than some others

customer_reviews.title: Durable product that should be useful for many seasons of ice fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with easy setup and tear down. 4 people would be a squeeze, 3 people would fit comfortably, very roomy for 2 people with lots of gear. Poles are sturdy. The product was a different color than pictured, but I liked the dark gray and black since it absorbs more heat if the sun is out. Could see some daylight thru the pinholes around the window and vent stitching, but it is not loose or ripping the fabric and you can tell the stitching is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Quit prime

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fit 4 people, 2 dogs, plus all gear, and small cooking table just fine. Super cozy, blocked the wind (up to 15 miles per hour) just fine. Super easy to set up and take down, the air vents work great for ventilating the tent. The black interior worked great to block out the light and spotting fish through the holes was easy. Over all just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Kier

customer_reviews.title: It can be a little hard to set up in the Wind
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice and I really like it it's a nice product
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and room
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy...fit three adults and 2 German Sheppard’s...we had the heater going it was nice to get out cold wind
customer_reviews.author: Heather m Rathburn

customer_reviews.title: Great! So easy and what a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I can set this up and tear it down in minutes. Totally hassle free. And I’m never any good at setting anything up so the fact it’s very girl friendly is awesome and the price was great. I really like it and used it all winter. Stays warm inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Since no floor make sure you have a portable heater because gets cold fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and take down .... Super easy to move recommend that you use anchors since it is so light ... Shell could be a little more durable seems as if they ran out of fabric because there s a random extra seam
customer_reviews.author: brian king

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product , easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Tent
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase. The tent was easy to set up, and did well on the lake. Pleased with the quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: great tent and sets up in less than one minute. I would recommend waterproofing all the seams before you use it though. Leaks pretty good in rain but never had an issue in snow.
customer_reviews.author: janice Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Colors are not what has shown or described, which is the only bummer for me. Quality seems ok, once it's used a few more times I'm sure it will stretch a little better.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy beats the competition
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up. Holds up to wind and the screw in spikes keep it where you need it. U can even be mobile by sliding it along. Quick set up too
customer_reviews.author: Portertd5548

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy setup and teardown. Very durable zippers good quality all in all good product
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good shanty for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's real easy to setup, I like the bag that came with it to store it in. It got to my house pretty quick too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and packs away just as easy.quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son he loves it. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and extremely easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks like nice product but not insulted. .insulation is described with product, (not happy!!!)had to reorder
customer_reviews.author: Bluegill 54

customer_reviews.title: This is not waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this tent loved the ease for setting up and taking down. Had great room, first time using it and it rained! the rain came in through the seams in the roof. soaking everything.. so much for waterproof. Looking for a warranty or someone to call just in case their is a easy fix but cannot seem to find the information on here. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: A great I shelter for a great price
customer_reviews.text: A great I shelter for a great price! I've only used mine a handful of times. But holds up very well. Stays fairly warm even without it being insulated. It's also very easy to set up, take down and put away. And fits three people quite comfortably. The stitching on some of the seams seem a little weak. But all in all a great product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Bayne

product_meta.title: Elkton Outdoors Portable 3-8 Person Ice Fishing Tent with Ventilation Windows and Carry Pack, Ice Fishing Shelter Includes Tent, Carry Pack, Ice Anchors and Storage Compartments
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF: Built with durable material and a water tight tarpaulin seal to ensure your Ice Fishing Tent stays warm and dry during your fishing trip!
EASY SETUP AND TAKE DOWN: Sets up and breaks down in only seconds! Simply follow the 30 second setup instructions and start fishing!

EASY TO PACK AND STORE: The included carry bag was designed to make packing easy! Made with an extra wide opening and draw string top and paired with adjustable backpack straps for easy transportation.
DIMENSIONS: This Ice Tent measures in at 70”x70” and 80” tall making it ideal for up to 3 people and all the essential ice fishing gear you will need for a great day of fishing!
INCLUDES: 1 Premium Ice Fishing Tent, Carry Pack With Backpack Straps, Ice Anchors & Tie Down Ropes!
